name: Cookie Match
description:
How to play

  • Move cookies to place them in the the right cookie cutters. 
  • All the cookies move in the same direction as a set.
  • Once a cookie meets the right cutter, the decoration is complete.  

Caution

  • Butter packs are unmovable, like a wall.
  • If a cookie hits the cutlery, then the cookie is fallen apart.

Control the direction with WASD: up / left / down / right or touch swipe
